plot: Jimmy Epson's parents have been afflicted with Necro Ambulatory Disorder, aka N.A.D.S., but that doesn't stop him from living a regular life. Just don't call his family Zombies.
title: Living with N.A.D.S.: The Jimmy Epson Story
plot_es: Jimmy Epson's parents have been afflicted with Necro Ambulatory Disorder, aka N.A.D.S., but that doesn't stop him from living a regular life. Just don't call his family Zombies.
